about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a psychological horror experience presented as unsettling found footage.

You are trapped in an endless, dimly lit hallway, with nothing but a flashlight to help you. Starting on floor 10, you have one goal — reach floor 0 and escape.

To escape, you must rely on your observation skills and instincts. Carefully scan your surroundings for anomalies — subtle or terrifying changes in the environment that signal something is not quite right. If the hallway remains unchanged, you may proceed forward to the elevator at the end of the floor. But if an anomaly is detected, turning back and retreating is your only means of survival. Failing to recognize an anomaly or moving forward when you shouldn’t may lead to consequences far worse than simply getting lost.

As you descend, spotting anomalies will become increasingly difficult, making you question every decision. The line between reality and nightmare begins to blur. Stay vigilant — every choice matters.

Key Features:

  • Found Footage Horror – Experience the game through a disturbing, grainy VHS aesthetic, enhancing the eerie and immersive atmosphere.

  • Observation-Based Gameplay – Your survival depends on your ability to notice subtle environmental changes. A misplaced object, a flickering light, or an unnatural shadow could mean the difference between progress and doom.

  • Dynamic Anomalies – No two playthroughs are exactly the same. Anomalies can appear in different ways and at different times, keeping you on edge and ensuring replayability.

Will you make it to floor 0, or will you become just another lost soul in the endless hallway?

You are trapped in an endless, dimly lit hallway, with nothing but a flashlight to help you. Starting on floor 10, you have one goal — reach floor 0 and escape.

Failing to recognize an anomaly or moving forward when you shouldn’t may lead to consequences far worse than simply getting lost.

As you descend, spotting anomalies will become increasingly difficult, making you question every decision. The line between reality and nightmare begins to blur. Stay vigilant — every choice matters.

name: Floor 0

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or higher)
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX6700XT
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A psychological horror presented as found footage. Trapped in an endless hallway from floor 10 to 0, you must spot anomalies to survive. Move forward if it's clear—turn back if it’s not. Every choice pulls you deeper into the unknown.
